1.title: Summary - Part 1

episode of.title: Traversable Wormholes: Enter the Wormhole (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: In this course we will explore Traversable Wormholes. The identification and production of exotic matter are seen to be a key technical challenge. These issues are reviewed and summarized, and an assessment on the present state of their resolution is provided.

imdb.plot outline: Russian Physicist, Gilad James, gives a lecture based insight to the theories of traveling to distant places through the science of traverable wormholes- in a course-like fashion. Attempt to illustrate science, math, geometry, exotic matter and closely held beliefs as limitations to defining the design and implementation of wormhole travel to intergalactic places- in short periods of time. An exercise in theory using hypotheses...
imdb.title: Traversable Wormholes: Enter the Wormhole
akas: Traversable Wormholes: Enter the Wormhole (United States)
